name: Flucht Scorched
description:
Flucht: scorched - the game that requires your inhuman reaction to lead your way to the escape.
Tons of enemies found out your arrival and coming to you to eliminate.

The game is pixel-izometic shooter. You should defend yourself against waves of enemies until the savior ship arriving.
Use environment effectively, find the best weapons, be smarter than your enemies and maybe than you can survive in this hell.

★ 10 hardest waves
★ various weapons
★ furious enemies
★ intuitive gameplay
★ Every try is impossible trial!
